text: Dodsworth is a 1936 American drama movie directed by William Wyler and was based on the 1929 novel by Sinclair Lewis and 1934 play of the same name by Sidney Howard. It stars Walter Huston, Ruth Chatterton, Paul Lukas, Mary Astor, David Niven, Gregory Gaye and was distributed by United Artists. It was nominated for 7 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1937. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Wyler
title: Dodsworth
